article_title: Obamacare Q&A: Updating your income could lead to canceled health plan
article_text: Another in a series of Q&A columns answering consumers’ questions about the Affordable Care Act. This week, Emily discusses pitfalls consumers should avoid when updating personal information for Covered California plans.

article_metadata.title: Obamacare Q&A: Updating your income could lead to canceled health plan | Fresno Bee
